trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on a site map node or collection of nodes for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma vista de dados num nó de mapa de site ou coleção de nós para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>controlo pode apresentar os respetivos dados subjacentes no formato de tabela e hierárquico para controlos de servidor Web que vincular ao mesmo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView is used by controls developers, but not page developers or in page code.
trans-unit.target: O SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView é utilizado pelos programadores de controlos, mas não os programadores de página ou no código da página.

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> to bind to site map data and present it in list form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to sitemap data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: Controla como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>para vincular a dados de mapa de site e apresente-lo no formato de lista, enquanto que os controlos de derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe, tal como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, vincular a dados de mapa de site e apresentá-lo na forma hierárquica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: If a data-bound control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> is created by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Se um controlo vinculado a dados chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>método do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>, um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>é criado pela origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl><xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method, a SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView is created.
trans-unit.target: Se um controlo chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>um SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView do método, é criado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>classe é fornecida para controlos de servidor Web que derivem de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e vincular a listas e dados de tabela, enquanto o SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView é fornecida para a Web server controla que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>e vincular a dados hierárquicos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Como todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>objetos de programa auxiliar, o SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView define as operações que pode efetuar a origem de dados com os dados subjacentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or insert, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Porque o SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView classe substituições apenas o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>método, associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>controlo não suporta expressões de ordenação ou inserir, eliminar ou atualizar operações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> class, adding the specified node to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection that the data source view maintains.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> classe, adicionar o nó especificado para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> coleção que mantém a vista de origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView> class maintains an internal <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView>classe mantém um interno <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>coleção de nós.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: When the SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView constructor is used, the specified node is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando é utilizado o construtor de SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView, o nó especificado é adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: A call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method will return this collection of one element.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>método irá devolver esta coleção de um elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> that the data source view represents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> que representa a vista de origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> class, setting the specified collection to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection that the data source view maintains.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> classe, a definição da coleção especificada para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> coleção que mantém a vista de origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView> class maintains an internal <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView>classe mantém um interno <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>coleção de nós.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: When the SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView constructor is used, the specified collection becomes the one the data source view maintains.
trans-unit.target: Quando é utilizado o construtor de SiteMapHierarchicalDataSourceView, a coleção especificada torna-se a uma vista de origem de dados mantém.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref> that the data source view represents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref> que representa a vista de origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> objects that represents the site navigation structure for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção do <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> objetos que representa a estrutura de navegação do site para o utilizador atual.

trans-unit.source: The Select method returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> collection of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O método Select devolve um <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>coleção de nós.</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.String.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object and iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar o <xref:System.String.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>de objeto e itere através desta coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.String.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection of site map nodes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> coleção de nós de mapa de site.
